Book Description: Alex Ott, or the Ã¢â‚¬Å“Sorcerer of Shaken and StirredÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ as dubbed by The New York Times (March 2011), is an organic chemist and master mixologist who has created cocktail menus for some of the best-known restaurants and bars in New York, Los Angeles, and Paris. He is a brand ambassador for Svedka Vodka, New Amsterdam Gin, Moet Hennessy, and Ecco Domani. On the opposite end of the spectrum, Alex has worked with the brand Mercy to concoct the ultimate hangover cure drink. NASA employs the mixologistÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s services in the making of space beverages. This is his first book.A collection of 75 mood-altering cocktail recipes for every occasion, with emphasis on natural ingredients to achieve delectable flavors.
